abilities.desc: Rushes to a target location while backtracking any damage taken the last 2.0 seconds.
abilities.name: Time Walk
abilities.notes: Faceless Void is invulnerable while using Time Walk.

abilities.desc: Faceless Void traps all nearby enemies in a time dilation field for [8, 9, 10, 11] seconds, extending their cooldowns and slowing their movement and attack speed by 10% for each cooldown extended. Deals bonus damage per second for each cooldown.
abilities.name: Time Dilation

abilities.desc: Adds the chance for an attack to lock an enemy unit in time while attacking it a second time.
abilities.name: Time Lock

abilities.desc: Available for 1.5 seconds after landing Time Walk. If used in this period, you will reverse your time walk back to your previous cast location. Does not affect health or proc scepter hits.
abilities.name: Reverse Time Walk

abilities.desc: Creates a blister in spacetime, trapping all units caught in its sphere of influence and causes you to move very quickly inside it.  Only Faceless Void and any units he controls are unaffected.  Invisible enemies in the sphere will be revealed.
abilities.name: Chronosphere
abilities.notes: Faceless Void is never affected by Chronospheres with any owner.
